robot_emulator_server.py
Go to the documentation of this file.
1 #!/usr/bin/env python
2 
3 """
4 SERVER OF THE SERVICE :
5 Service emulates the robot IE: Given a state and an action, picks a random valid next state
6 and returns corresponding (state_next, reward, done, info) tuple.
7 
8 Run this node as a standalone without any enclosing namespace
9 
10 @params
11 Request
12 int64 state - Current state
13 int64 action - Selected action
14 string terminating - True if using terminating model, else False
15 Response
16 int64 state_next - Randomly chosen valid next state
17 int64 reward - Immedeate reward
18 bool terminal - Is done?
19 string info - Additional info
20 
21 """
22 
23 import random
24 import rospy
25 from tejas.srv import EnvStep, EnvStepResponse
26 import env
27 
28 TERM_P = []
29 NON_TERM_P = []
30 
31 
32 def reshape_reward(reward, positive, negative):
33  return positive if reward == -1 else negative
34 
35 
36 def emulate_step(state, action, terminating):
37  if terminating == "False" or terminating == "false":
38  term = False
39  elif terminating == "True" or terminating == "true":
40  term = True
41  else:
42  print("Faulty EnvStepRequest.terminating")
43  return 0, 0, 0, "Faulty EnvStepRequest.terminating"
44 
45  P = TERM_P if term else NON_TERM_P
46  p_distribution = P[state][action] # Stochastic response for given state and action = 3 tuples of 4 elements [s_, r, t, i]
47  random_choice = p_distribution[random.choice((0, 1, 2))] # Randomly determine a single response = 1 tuple of 4 elements [s_, r, t, i]
48  state_next = random_choice[1]
49  reward = random_choice[2] if term else reshape_reward(random_choice[2], 3, -3)
50  terminal = random_choice[3]
51  info = ""
52  return state_next, reward, terminal, info
53 
54 def step_action(req):
55  print("Received request : S={} A={} T= {}".format(req.state, req.action, req.terminating))
56  state_next, reward, terminal, info = emulate_step(req.state, req.action, req.terminating)
57  print("Returning S_={} R={} T={} I={}".format(state_next, reward, terminal, info))
58  return EnvStepResponse(state_next, reward, terminal, info)
59 
60 
61 def robot_emulator_service():
62  rospy.init_node("robot_emulator_server")
63  emulator_service = rospy.Service("robot_emulator_service", EnvStep, step_action)
64 
65  global TERM_P, NON_TERM_P
66  env.buildP(True)
67  TERM_P = env.P
68  env.scrubP()
69  env.buildP(False)
70  NON_TERM_P = env.P
71  env.scrubP()
72 
73  print("Emulator running")
74  rospy.spin()
75 
76 
77 if __name__ == "__main__":
78  robot_emulator_service()
